main event: A witness observed a bright white light in the night sky over Kansas City on 9 October 1963.
interesting points: The light appeared to be the size of a bright star and drifted slowly before disappearing when obstructed by houses., The sighting lasted between 8 to 10 minutes., The witness is described as a reliable telephone lineman., The report indicates that no known aircraft were in the area at the time., Previous sighting reported by the same witness in 1949.
sighted object: a bright white light in the night sky
